comment: Mohammad saab iswardoot hai sri krishna khud iswar hai sanatani kisi ko convert hone ke liye nahi bolte
amr:
# ::snt Mohammad saab iswardoot hai sri krishna khud iswar hai sanatani kisi ko convert hone ke liye nahi bolte
(a / and
      :op1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Mohammad"
                  :op2 "Saqoot"))
      :op2 (p2 / person
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Sri"
                  :op2 "Krishna"))
      :op3 (p3 / person
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Khud"))
      :op4 (p4 / person
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Sanatani"))
      :op5 (p5 / person
            :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "Kisi"))
      :op6 (c / convert-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 y)
      :op7 (k / ke))
